name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-msgext-search-nodejs
title: Search Based Messaging Extension
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates how to create a Node.js Messaging Extension in Microsoft Teams that enables users to perform searches and retrieve results seamlessly.
longDescription: This Node.js sample illustrates the development of a search-based Messaging Extension for Microsoft Teams, allowing users to search for information directly within their Teams environment. It showcases how to handle search commands, interact with the Bot Framework, and display search results effectively.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing search based messaging extension

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
